availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. McHatten (Owen County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James McHatten and Jane McHatten. Married to Ann McHatten. Father of Julia McHatten, Mary W. McHatten, Annie E. McHatten, Kate W. McHatten, Margaret McHatten, and James McHatten. Farmer in Owen County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 224.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 182A.
